#text=This morning , I took a public bus so I could go to the beach .
#text=The bus fare is cheaper than a taxi .
#text=In my city , it costs $ 2.00 to ride .
#text=First , I waited at the bus stop near to my house .
#text=When the bus stopped for me , I walked up the steps , which are pretty high .
#text=I said hello to the bus-driver and he gave me a friendly smile .
#text=I paid my fare went to look for a seat .
#text=There are usually a lot of people riding , but today it was pretty empty .
#text=The bus began to move , so I had to get my footing .
#text=I saw a good corner spot in the back and made my way .
#text=I was hanging onto the poles because I did not want to fall over when the bus started to pick up speed .
#text=There was an older woman who I passed and she had about two bags with her and she was humming a quiet song .
#text=There were pen markings on the chair in front of me and a piece of gum stuck to the window .
#text=I sat down , got a book out and read for a little while .
#text=People got on and off the bus while we drove .
#text=I knew my stop was coming up when I saw the mall .
#text=The bus ride took about thirty minutes .
#text=I stood up to pull the chord for my stop and a light at the front of the bus lit up bright red .
#text=The bus stopped and the doors opened and I got out from the back of the bus .
